overview: Mysteriously stepping out of the pages of history, the heroic titans and warriors of the past are regenerated and revitalized, marching into a sexual consciousness no one can dare deny. It is a collision of cultures and characters--all of them united to fan the flames of fevered passion, leaving their imprint on the hearts and souls of men. Their lust is intense; their hunger unconquerable; their man-lust timeless.
title: The Conquest
